title: Merge LeadMagnetSection into StrategyCallSection as 3-box single-row layout

requirements.text: Rewrite StrategyCallSection.tsx to replace the current two-column layout with a new single-row layout containing three side-by-side boxes: Box 1 — 'Schedule Your Call' containing the existing Calendly placeholder (bordered box with 'Calendly scheduling widget will appear here' text, styled to match the dark theme), the 'Schedule Call Now' gold CTA button (href: 'https://calendly.com/your-link'), and the WhatsApp 'Chat on WhatsApp' green button (href: 'https://wa.me/918766936874'); Box 2 — 'Send a Message' containing the existing contact form with Name, Email, and Amazon Store URL fields plus a 'Send Message' submit button with the existing submission success state; Box 3 — '7 Profit Killers in Amazon PPC' containing the full content currently in LeadMagnetSection: the description text 'Discover the 7 most common mistakes that drain Amazon PPC budgets — and how to fix them. Download your free guide now.', the email input field, the gold 'Get Free PDF' CTA button, and the existing success message state on submit. All three boxes must use glassmorphism card styling with gold border accents, consistent with the existing design system. On mobile, the three boxes must stack vertically. The section heading 'Book Your Free 30-Minute Amazon Growth Strategy Call' and supporting text must remain at the top of the section. Retain the section's slightly lighter background (#0D1526) and gold accent top border.

quotes: merge 7 Profit Killers in Amazon PPC section into the FREE STRATEGY CALL.. like Schedule Your Call in one box.. Send a Message... in another box.. 7 Profit Killers section in 3rd box in one row
mo keep the same content icons etc.. just places one neside another in 3 boxes.. in one row.. as itstaking more space on page

acceptanceCriteria: StrategyCallSection displays three boxes side-by-side in a single row on desktop
Box 1 contains the Calendly placeholder, Schedule Call Now button (href: https://calendly.com/your-link), and WhatsApp button (href: https://wa.me/918766936874)
Box 2 contains the contact form with Name, Email, Amazon Store URL fields and Send Message button with existing submission success state
Box 3 contains the 7 Profit Killers description, email capture form, Get Free PDF button, and success message state
All three boxes use glassmorphism card styling with gold borders consistent with the site design system
On mobile, the three boxes stack vertically in order (Box 1, Box 2, Box 3)
Section heading and supporting text remain visible at the top of the section
Section background (#0D1526) and gold accent top border are retained
All existing icons, styling, and form functionality are preserved — no content is lost

requirements.text: Remove the standalone LeadMagnetSection component from App.tsx (currently positioned after ComparisonSection) since its content has been merged into Box 3 of StrategyCallSection. Also remove the SectionConnector instance that was placed immediately before or after LeadMagnetSection in the App.tsx section order. Update the App.tsx import list to remove the LeadMagnetSection import.

quotes: The standalone LeadMagnetSection will be removed from its current position (after ComparisonSection) since its content is being merged into Box 3

acceptanceCriteria: LeadMagnetSection is no longer rendered anywhere in App.tsx
The LeadMagnetSection import is removed from App.tsx
The SectionConnector that was adjacent to LeadMagnetSection is removed so no orphaned connector remains
The page flow reads: ... ComparisonSection → SectionConnector → StrategyCallSection (with no LeadMagnetSection in between)
No visual gap or broken layout appears where LeadMagnetSection previously existed

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
All existing content, icons, and form functionality from both StrategyCallSection and LeadMagnetSection must be preserved — nothing should be lost, only consolidated
The email capture form in Box 3 must remain static/UI-only with no backend wiring
nonGoals: Wiring any form to a backend email service
Adding new content or icons not already present in the existing components
Changing the design system, color palette, or global styles
Modifying any other section components beyond StrategyCallSection and App.tsx
